oily.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He wiped his hands on an oily rag.
oily.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: oily hair or skin contains more natural oil than is usual or desirable
oily.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: oily food contains a lot of oil or fat
oily.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: someone who is oily is very polite, in a way that other people think is unpleasant and not sincere
